post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Description
Our financial services client requires a Senior Java Developer for a 6-month contract opportunity. Strong development experience in a distributed Windows or Java environment in addition to expert Java knowledge and previous experience with XML / XSD / JAXB, JMS, Tibco, SQL, Ant build scripting, Unix and shell scripting is required to qualify. Additional experience with trading systems is considered an asset.

As the successful applicant, you will develop and support distributed and database driven applications in Java as well as apply analytical skills to resolve problems and deliver solutions. You will also design and develop quality solutions for systems issues that are consistent with project objectives; develop, implement and maintain solutions that maximize system availability; and provide periodic scope assistance.

For immediate consideration, don’t delay, apply online today!

Skills

Java (Must Have)

J2EE (Must Have)

SQL (Must Have)

HTML (Must Have)

distributed windows (Must Have)

SDLC Knowledge (Must Have)

UNIX (Must Have)

XML (Must Have)

Leadership (Must Have)

XSD (Must Have)

Trading Systems (Must Have)
Job Reference        :        119500
Position Type        :        Temporary
Sector        :        Information Technology
Location        :        Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Contact        :        Sapphire Technologies Canada, Canada



http://www.dovajobs.com/job-details.html?jobid=3009354&jobtitle=java+developer&joblocation=toronto&jobcountryid=38
post.title: Senior Java Developer
